identity.name: E1 - The Structural Swiss
identity.persona: A precision-obsessed structural designer who believes in the beauty of raw calculation. No fluff, just data, grid lines, and absolute clarity. The UI should feel like a well-drafted blueprint: clean, high-contrast, and reliable.
key_principles: Data over Decoration: Every pixel must serve the calculation.
Grid is God: Alignment is non-negotiable. Use visible grid lines to structure content.
High Contrast: Engineers work in bright offices and dark sites. Text must pop.
Feedback is Instant: Inputs trigger immediate visual updates.

primary.name: Engineering Blue
primary.usage: Primary Actions, Active States, Key Result Lines

accent.name: Safety Orange
accent.usage: Warnings, Error States, Critical Failure Zones

shadows.usage: No drop shadows. Use borders and background contrast to define depth.

textures.noise: Subtle noise overlay on sidebar/headers for 'paper' texture

dashboard.rules: Full height children. No jagged bottoms. Dense information packing.

input_form.mobile: Stack Input on top, Visualization sticky at bottom or togglable

report_preview.background: bg-white text-black (Even in dark mode, preview stays white like paper)

Button.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-sm). Uppercase text. Technical precision.

Input.style: High Contrast Border. Monospace text for numbers.
Input.classes: border-2 border-slate-200 focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 rounded-sm font-mono bg-slate-50 dark:bg-slate-900

Table.header: bg-slate-100 dark:bg-slate-800 font-bold uppercase text-xs tracking-wider

usage.micro_interactions: Button press scale (0.98). Input focus border expand.
usage.charts: Grow from bottom (bar) or draw path (line).

hero.description: Abstract geometric concrete shapes for landing page hero

about.description: Engineers collaborating with blueprints and laptops

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL lucide-react (if not present): 'yarn add lucide-react'
INSTALL recharts (if not present): 'yarn add recharts'
CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Add 'JetBrains Mono' and 'Manrope' to font families.
USE SHADCN: Heavily customize radius to '0.2rem' (sm) for that sharp technical feel.
LAYOUT: Use the 'Split Screen' layout for the 'New Design' page. It is critical for engineering usability.
THEME: Implement the 'Eurocode Standard' color palette defined above.
CHARTING: Use Recharts for Bending Moment and Shear Force diagrams. Style them with the Primary Blue stroke and transparent fill with vertical grid lines.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Do NOT use rounded corners > 6px. Keep it sharp.
Inputs must have high contrast borders. Engineers hate faint inputs.
For the PDF Export feature, create a dedicated 'Print Layout' component that renders the data in a clean, A4-friendly format.
